website_summaries.verdict: Switchmate's no-fuss installation is intriguing, but some significant limitations hold it back from greatness.
pros: Switchmate units cost just $40 each, they couldn't be simpler to install, and the related Android/iPhone app is very intuitive
cons: Amazon Alexa integration is forthcoming, but Switchmate doesn't currently work with any third-party smart home products/platforms
Remote access is limited to Bluetooth range, the switches are loud, and they're too big for side-by-side installs on 2-gang+ switch plates

customer_reviews.title: Extremely unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these switches this year and all three have similar problems of not connecting or not turning on or off even when the phone is only a fioot away. It burns through batteries and a day does not go by where I am not having to remove it, reset it, or delete it from the app and add it back to start over. Great concept and terrific when it works, but after I put them on the wall my wife takes them off as she is even more unhappy with this product than I am.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Lempert

customer_reviews.title: Good product, might need a little adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I had some initial problems with my Switchmate, the installation and programming was easy but the device didn't consistently turn my switch on or off (even with the included adapter). I contacted their tech support via email and received detailed instructions on how to adjust the physical rocker switch (turned out it was set too deeply into the wall). Once adjusted everything works find now. Kudos to their support staff, they responded to my emails within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Magnets aren’t strong enough to stay attached to the light switch so it’s useless. The toggle version works great but this version for rocker switches unfortunately doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Farnum

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work immediately on a basic lutron toggle switch. ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work immediately on a basic lutron toggle switch. The activator switch (on the back of the unit) didn't hit the toggle enough to switch it off--it was too shallow. I ended up taping a soft earplug to the switch (where it contacts the lutron toggle) with duct tape and it made sufficient contact to operate it. So it works now but it took home modification to make it work. Odd they didn't make the contact deeper or have an adapter or something to modify it.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product. The install is simple, assuming it actually fits and doesn't fall off when it actuates, a side effect of the easy install. The app constantly has connectivity issues. I ordered and 1 of them failed a firmware update and is now sitting on my desk, completely bricked. The other 3 are OK, 2 were tricky to get to fit and actually toggle correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Edlund

customer_reviews.title: Needs Improved Design and Testing
customer_reviews.text: This item still needs some design work. The concept is great, but the execution leaves much to be desired. When I activated the switch it either pulled away from the screws holding it in place, or it did not roll the rocker switch completely on or off. I even tried the poorly designed extra piece that is supposed to solve this problem, but that did not help. Just for good measure, I tried the Switchmate on several switches, all with the same results.
customer_reviews.author: R. G. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: I have the rocker switches, this needs tweaking, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the rocker switches, this needs tweaking, does not work, insert that comes with it needs to be longer and magnets probably needs to be stronger. when you turn it on, the unit separates from the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Ereyn

customer_reviews.title: They are hard to pair.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 2 of these for 3 years now. They work good when they are paired & have charge in the batteries. The problem is that every time the batteries need changed you have to pair the devise again and they don't want to pair or the app stops working. I've tried turning the bt on & off,getting close to the devise. I think I'm going to search for a better devise at this stage.
customer_reviews.author: Spenzalot

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to setup, unfortunately the motor is not strong enough to flip the switch. It tries but grinds to a hault. Tried it on 12 switches in our house and it was only strong enough to flip the switch on 1. Was very easy to download the app and set up the timer, but if it can’t flip the switch then it is about as useful as asking my dog to go out and fill up my car with gas.
customer_reviews.author: 1xian

customer_reviews.title: Works great- keep the removable part
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Rocker Switch version. NOTE: On the back of the SwitchMate there is a removable part which needs to be kept for the switch to work as designed. Initially, i thought this part was for protection, but then found the switch works better with it. One of my switches did not come with it, but SwitchMate quickly sent out a replacement part. I have bought 2 of these and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: kpmagic

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like the product
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like the product, had high hopes and wanted it to work as described for the pure simplicity of it since most of the other "smart switches" needed a neutral wire which would require a lot of rewiring in my older home. However, the magnets are not strong enough to hold the Switchmate in place when it tries to toggle between on/off. Therefore nothing happens. Installation is super easy and as described. But unfortunately, completely useless in it's current form if it can't stay in place to effectively move the switch.
customer_reviews.author: ChubB

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wasn’t There
customer_reviews.text: When the switch delivered I instantly was ready to apply it to my light switch. However, the mechanism didn’t reach the switch on it’s own, so I had to glue a washer to the bottom of the product on the side that faces the switch. Then, it worked fine. Until 7 months later it completely stopped working for an unknown reason. I changed the batteries and it stilk didn’t work. I don’t reccomend you purchase this product. You’re better off spending the extra buck on a better quality version.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Siciliano

customer_reviews.title: The Switchmate whilst a good concept fails to hold up in reality
customer_reviews.text: The Switchmate whilst a good concept fails to hold up in reality. Unable to magnetically stick to my old and new bedroom light switches which are quite common in Australia. I had to use sticky strips to connect it and even now the switch sometimes doesn't turn on when activated. The mechanism isn't quite good enough at actually flicking the switch. This being said, it has good connectivity and I use it via voice command through my Amazon Echo Device & Logitech Harmony setup. Just isn't quite as good as I had expected from the advertising. In Short; -Good concept -Weak magnets -Weak switching mechanism -Good connectivity
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mabbs

customer_reviews.title: Great for my outdoor house lights!
customer_reviews.text: I know these have mixed reviews, but I love mine. I bought one at Target months ago, but they didn't carry them anymore. I was happy to find one on Amazon. I use them on my switches for my outdoor lights on my house. I love having them timed to turn off and on so I don't have to remember to do it every day. It's also great for when we are vacationing. I did have to fiddle with it a bit to get it just right on the main switch, but once I did, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: choosey mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Possibly I expected more. Doesn't work on most of our switches because they are too onset. Keeps losing connection. Must be 10 feet away from it for it to work (was hoping my son could turn on lights in the hall from his room but he cannot). Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cueno

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying out.
customer_reviews.text: Very very easy install and you don't have to worry about a 3 way switch like with standard WiFi switches you hardwire in. Is this device perfect? No. But considering the ease of install and the app being easy to use it is a good idea. My only complaint is that it will lose connection to my phone on occasion and takes about 1-2 mins to connect again for unknown reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sanchez C-137

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work for my rocker switches at all. ...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work for my rocker switches at all. I will be returning this product. It is also a very noisy motor that tries to switch on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT I EXPECTED/WANTED
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY WHAT I EXPECTED/WANTED... I simply wanted a timer for my outdoor coach lights and it works just as stated!!! Beyond pleased!!! Put this on a FOUR switch light to operate only one light and does just what I wanted!!! After I found it worked I added a second for the two switch to timer the other outdoor lights.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B.

customer_reviews.title: Device protrusion too shallow
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this does not work on my rocker light switch. We have a pretty generic light switch, and have tried it on several different light switches but would not work on any of them. The issue is the protrusion on the back of the device is too shallow to reach the light switch
customer_reviews.author: ribeye

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Losses connection repeatedly. Does not have a well designed magnet system. Falls off the switch.
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this, but in reality, the Bluetooth connection is shaky, at best. My connection drops every other day or so, making the timer aspect I desired, of little value. Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use Prime And Save the Box
customer_reviews.text: As noted by others, it is a nice concept but doesn't work on all switches although they may appear the same. It worked on 2 of the 4 rocker switches I attempted. I'm not returning but don't recommend it. I'll likely donate it once I get wired switches installed.
customer_reviews.author: Price Above Rubies

customer_reviews.title: Device Works, but limited use
customer_reviews.text: The device works good, but you have to be home to control it. It needs to be able to be controlled while you are away from the home. I thought that it worked with Alexa, but it doesn't. You have to purchase another device I guess to allow Alexa to control it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers also pointed out, this product is not reliable. I used this to control the porch light as a dusk/dawn timer. It would occasionally fail to activate the timer. Well, what is the point of having a 'smart' switch if you still have to check the light every evening/morning? It's useless in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and use. Its handy in that you can move it around to different switches too. Only issue I’ve had with it is it doesn’t seem to fit all my rocker switches? Then again that could be user error 🤔
customer_reviews.author: meg b

customer_reviews.title: Better than timer
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with rocker switch. Very easy installation. Just make sure the switchmate and switch are both on ON position when you put the switchmate over the switch. The magnet is enough to hold the switchmate over the switch during its operation to turn on and off the switch. App is very user friendly. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Romos

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I wanted it for
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it to automatically turn outside lights on/off at the same time each day/night. Set it up and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Living in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: it works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I just use it as a timer for lights. Read the set up and do as they say, maybe move the switch a little to set proper and perfect. So far all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hill

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the rocker version
customer_reviews.text: The rocker version I bought doesn't reach far enough back to actually hit the rocker. The instructions said to switch the gray part with the white part. There was no gray part included. Returning them. The toggle one may be a different issue, but it was no-go for the rocker switch ones I bought.
customer_reviews.author: JLT

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat loud, but very useful and fun. The only problem is you can't put two side-by-side on a dual switch. :/
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup but it only works sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup but it only works sometimes. Every other week or so the app will show an error for "Your Switchmate ... has been reset by another user" and forces me to do the pairing process over again before I can use it. There are no other users in my house so this is definitely buggy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Better than manually having to turn switch off and on but not ideal
customer_reviews.text: Like being able to switch outdoor lights off and on but programmed times do not always work and have to be close with app to work

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: The idea was great the the implementation and use was terrible. I think you should not waste you money on this product.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful. Not compatible with Alexa despite having a skill available on the Alexa store. Doesn’t stay connected. Only works with certain switch coverings. Magnets aren’t strong enough which causes it to fall off the wall. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for a couple of days, but then stopped working and had to be reset every day or two. Bought it to function as a timer for our porch lights when we were out of town. Worked for two days, then the lights were off for the rest of our trip. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product...
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, terrible execution. I have a hard time believing there was any quality assurance or testing done on this product. I've got 10 rocker switches in my house, this thing failed to switch on all 10 of them.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonsMyWeakness

customer_reviews.title: Effective and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: It’s so nice to be able to turn my gas fireplace on and off without getting up! The product is inexpensive, a little bit noisy and not fancy in any way, but it does the job and that’s all that matters!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Works about half the time on my iPhone. Switchmate ...
customer_reviews.text: Works about half the time on my iPhone. Switchmate will not respond to thier " contact us" on thier web page. I will NOT buy anymore from. Them.
customer_reviews.author: G M Busch

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: They are much slower than z-wave, zigbee and WiFi switches we have, but reason for the return is the mechanism that locks and unlocks is very noisy. Sounds like grinding gears every time the switch turns on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and useful

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool product, works great and so easy to install (10-15 seconds)!

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes these work sometimes they don't. Don't use the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes these work sometimes they don't. Don't use the cheap batteries that come with that will solve most issues with connection.
customer_reviews.author: Sb

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, despite advertising ease of use, the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, despite advertising ease of use, the product simply didn't work in our apartment. The mechanism used to switch the rocker on and off just didn't work with our somewhat worn switches (any of them in our apartment). Because we never really got to see the product in action I won't give it one-star, but just be aware that it won't work in every home.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Chang

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have the power to toggle my light switches. ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have the power to toggle my light switches. Tried it on several switches through my house. Instructions says device comes with two adapters, mine only came with one. No matter if I used the adapter or not it couldn't toggle the switch.
customer_reviews.author: M R G

customer_reviews.title: Rocker switch version is useless
customer_reviews.text: This switch is garbage. The thing is sliding up and down but no contact being made. Totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: David Finley

customer_reviews.title: Dont match
customer_reviews.text: When you download the app, nothing about a switch for the lights
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever. Returned for a refund because the lights don’t work if your cell phone is not there. Doesn’t do anything for security as the lights stay off if your gone and the only real thing it did was drain my cell phone battery. Horrible product
customer_reviews.author: Kraig C.

customer_reviews.title: Everything is as listed
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived ahead of schedule in original Packing . It was very easy to install and works as described. I have bought more of these.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for home automation
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. I got this to go with my Goole Home. However I could not get it to work with it. It also has to sit perfectly on the switch and some of my switches it wouldn't flip them at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Seiter

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, not well executed.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for the price, and quality. I would recommend it, because the new update makes it WIFI capable, so you could go anywhere around the house, and you will be able to control it. You are not able to use it with Alexa, (yet). It is quite loud, but it doesn’t affect me too much. They had a really good idea going, but if they just put a little bit more money into it, it would be an amazing product. 4 stars, until you could use it with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: her0n

customer_reviews.title: Solve the Blue Tooth Connectivity issue and I'll be back
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was never able to get the blue tooth on the switch to connect to the app on my phone. After reading the plethora of reviews complaining about how unreliable the blue tooth connectivity was for them, I just returned it. Love the idea - but without reliable blue tooth connectivity it's just not useful...
customer_reviews.author: Todd T.

customer_reviews.title: DON"T BUY IT.....Garbage
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY IT!!!! Worthless and defective device. I return it and they still kept my money...
customer_reviews.author: Big

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product as I did not have a neutral wire. My major issue is, this does not stick properly, it either falls down or does not turn the switch off.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this five stars except that it took several attempts to get my bluetooth to communicate with switch. Luckily, I have set mine once and not had to try to connect again because I like where it's set.

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to installing programmable light switches
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing, I have 2 of them in the household in areas where I wouldn’t bother installing a programmable light switch. Works well, battery life is exceptional and easy to use via Apps Store app!
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. Programming is a joke. Device does not follow programming instructions. Total junk
customer_reviews.text: I have no neutral wires in my light switch boxes meaning I cannot use any modern devices for remote control...except for this. Really simple to install and a no brainer to program. Only one problem: DOES NOT WORK! I've set the timer for dusk to dawn for my outside lights and it seldom if ever works. Totally frustrating - really unhappy with what seemed to be a promising product. Ultimately a complete fail and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tridacna

customer_reviews.title: ) love it, works on cell app
customer_reviews.text: this was my second one, first from another amazon'er was inadequate, this one worked first, second and every try perfectly from magnetic hold only :) love it, works on cell app!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Q sent me!

customer_reviews.title: I feel safe
customer_reviews.text: I love my Switchmate. I can sit in my car and turn on my porch light and feel safe before getting out of my car.

customer_reviews.text: The switch mate snap on did not work when first attached to the switch. I had to adjust and worked for few days. Now again it loses the connectivity with the switch and is not functional

customer_reviews.title: Once it's working its great.
customer_reviews.text: Placing the item on the switch was a little tricky. If it wasn't just right it would not work. Also, the instructions in the app are not very clear. Once it's working its great.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this light switch the thing that is so great about it is that if I’m not home I could turn on my porch light with it to make it look like I’m at my house I would definetly recommend this for anyone

customer_reviews.title: Good, but one of the expected smart switch options
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could control it like a timer. So my roommate doesn't keep leaving the light on all day long.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great just as it says. So easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, no tools necessary and easy to use. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, the usage is ok according what I ...

customer_reviews.author: Erick Batista

customer_reviews.title: It makes noice when it is working. I am ...
customer_reviews.text: It makes noice when it is working. I am not sure if it is just defective or just badly made.

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea! I have it set so it goes ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! I have it set so it goes on and off at certain times. I love how easy it was to set up! I would consider getting more for other areas of my house and for outside porch lights.

customer_reviews.title: There great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I have them all over the house makes my life easier.

customer_reviews.title: off but not on
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't turn the lights back on. Doesn't seem like the mechanism is long enough to hit my switches. Maybe it's just mine, but I tried on multiple switches.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 6 in total two have gone defective 5 days after I couldn't return it any longer..

customer_reviews.title: Rocker Switch is Useless
customer_reviews.text: The feet inside don't even touch the switch to turn off or on WTF.......Just JUNK Do not buy The Rocker switch The Toggle switch is ok but will not shut off when it is set to off.

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Malfunctions all the time. Have not had any luck on programming to go on and off at dusk and dawn. Only good thing is that sometimes I can use it to turn off the light from my bed. Not always.

customer_reviews.text: This is a poor item. It will not stay connected and you have to reprogram it all the time and sometimes it will not even reprogram standing next to it. I will not purchase this again.

customer_reviews.text: I would give this a zero if I could. The only redeeming quality of this product is the ease of installation and connectivity. After that, it is all downhill. It doesn't always come on when I come home and it never turns off after 15 minutes. The timer never works and after having been emailed twice, there has been no response from Switchmate.

customer_reviews.text: Great product; it took a couple times to get the switch to turn on and off but after that it worked seemlessly.

customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have ever bought!! I can go to bed first, then turn the light out from my phone. This works directly with the switch, so it works with an overhead light, not just a plug in lamp. LOVE IT!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all homes or as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Love knowing the light will be on when I get home after dark. Fits all switch types.

customer_reviews.text: Works but will burn through batteries fast, wouldn't buy again.

customer_reviews.text: Did not work from my driveway. Is a good solution if you don't want to walk downstairs to turn off a light but the range is not far enough for me
customer_reviews.author: Sally Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Hands free!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great invention and super easy to setup :) I am using this switch to turn on and off my outdoor lights using the built in timer. I was constantly forgetting to turn off the lights when I went to bed. I now have this device programmed to turn on at sunset and off at a certain time. I don't have to touch anything. The app allows you to name each switch and let's you know when the batteries need replacing. I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cruising gal

customer_reviews.title: So useful, but a the noise it makes is a ...
customer_reviews.text: So useful, but a the noise it makes is a little irritating (still beats getting out of bed to turn off the lights).
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love not having to get up to hit the switch
customer_reviews.text: Love not having to get up to hit the switch, but sometimes connectivity sucks and takes a while to show the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Alisea Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea and wish it would have
customer_reviews.text: When it was activated it would leave the switch right in the middle so it would not be turned on nor off. Love the idea and wish it would have worked

customer_reviews.text: Keeps disconnecting and NEVER turns on automatically when I come home.
customer_reviews.author: G. M.

product_meta.title: Switchmate Snap-On Instant Smart Light Switch That Listens - Switchmate Rocker
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteSwitchmate automatically turns on lights as you arrive home or enter rooms and is installed through a simple one-second installation, so everyone can enjoy the many benefits of smart lighting without the hassle of complicated set ups. It is the first smart home product that can be use with absolutely no configuration, tools, wiring, or wifi. Switchmate instantly attaches magnetically to existing toggle or rocker switches and is controlled through the free app on your smart phone. Always makes it look like you are home for enhanced security with Switchmates timers that automatically turn your lights on/off, and function even when you’re away from your home. Switchmate instantly modernizes old, outdated light switches and transform in-home décor, which can be conveniently moved around the home or taken when you relocate. Just snap, tap, and start enjoying smart lighting simplified with Switchmate.
Note: Refer installation manual available under technical specification for troubleshooting steps.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Convenience Having Switchmate means being able to control your lights from your phone through a one-second installation- no tools, wiring, or wifi required. Now you don't have to get up from your bed or couch to turn off the lights. 

Comfort Switchmate knows when you're home and can turn lights on for you. This means never having to return to a dark home again. 




Snap Instantly attaches to standard light switches magnetically

Tap Tap the "connect" icon on your smartphone

Start Enjoy your new smart home




One-Second Smart Light Switch Attaches to existing light switches in one-second.




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

One-Second Smart Lighting 

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

We want to simplify the conplex home automation category with Switchmate

What makes your product special?

The only one-second installation smart light switch in the world. 

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

The consumer acceptance and enthusiasm for Switchmate has been incredibly fulfilling.
feature_bullets: Instantly snaps over existing light switches
Automatically turns on lights as you arrive home or enter rooms
Timers- turns lights on/off automatically even when you’re away
One-second install: no tools or wiring
Portable – take it when you move
